summary.span: 表示抽象基底類別，用於管理 或 可包含之所有項目的事件和配置。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class that manages events and layout for all the elements that a or can contain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A例如按鈕、 下拉式方塊、 文字方塊中或標籤中可包含的項目控制項或控制，類似於 Windows 快顯功能表。A is an element such as a button, combo box, text box, or label that can be contained in a control or a control, which is similar to a Windows shortcut menu. 類別會管理繪製和鍵盤和滑鼠輸入，包括拖放輸入，針對這些項目，而類別管理事件與項目本身內的版面配置。The class manages the painting and keyboard and mouse input, including drag-and-drop input, for these elements, and the class manages events and layout within the elements themselves. 類別是直接繼承自，或它們間接繼承自透過或。 classes either inherit directly from , or they inherit indirectly from through or . 控制項必須包含在， ， ，或並無法直接加入至表單。 controls must be contained in a , , , or and cannot be added directly to a form. 不同的容器類別設計成包含適當的子集控制項。The various container classes are designed to contain an appropriate subset of controls. **請注意**給定不能有多個父系。**Note** A given cannot have more than one parent . 您必須將複製的並將它加入其他控制項。You must copy of the and add it to other controls. 下表顯示的項目衍生自類別因此可以裝載於或。The following table shows the elements that derive from the class and which therefore can be hosted in a or . |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||支援影像和文字的工具列按鈕。A toolbar button that supports images and text.| ||通常用於狀態列的文字標籤或做為註解或標題。A text label typically used in a status bar or as a comment or title.| ||不可選取的空格或以視覺化方式群組項目垂直列的空間。A non-selectable space or space with a vertical bar that visually groups elements.| ||A裝載， ， ，其他 Windows Form 控制項或自訂控制項。A that hosts a , , , other Windows Forms controls, or custom controls.

A是使用者可以在其中輸入文字、 清單，使用者可以從中選取要填滿文字方塊中文字的文字方塊。A is a text box in which the user can enter text, along with a list from which the user can select text to fill the text box.

A可讓使用者輸入的文字。A enables the user to enter text.

A表示 Windows 進度列控制項中包含。A represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a .| ||A裝載， ，和。A that hosts a , , and .

A會顯示功能表或內容功能表上的可選取選項。A is a selectable option displayed on a menu or context menu.

A是一般按鈕和下拉式按鈕的組合。A is a combination of a regular button and a drop-down button.

A是支援的功能下拉式按鈕。A is a button that supports drop-down functionality.| ||中的面板控制項。A panel in a control.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a custom control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得或設定 屬性，您必須加入隨 .NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework. 如需可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library"Active Accessibility 」 一節[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). 如需範例，請參閱類別。For samples, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的屬性會描述從使用者的觀點來看操作物件的主要方法。An object's property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint. 這個屬性應該是動詞或短動詞片語。This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的物件有預設動作，而且有些物件可能會有相關的預設動作其屬性，如下列範例所示：Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: - 選取的核取方塊具有 「 取消核取 」 的預設動作而值為 「 已核取 」。A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked." - 已清除核取方塊具有 「 檢查 」 的預設動作，值是 「 未核取 」。A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked." - 標示的按鈕**列印**沒有值具有 「 按下 」 的預設動作。A button labeled **Print** has a default action of "Press," with no value. - 標籤或文字方塊控制項顯示**印表機**沒有預設動作，不過會有值為"Printer"。A label or a text box control that shows **Printer** has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer." 可存取物件的屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 內容的描述性屬性 > 中 MSDN Library 中的"Active Accessibility > 一節，網址http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 如需範例，請參閱類別。For samples, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的屬性會提供有關物件的視覺外觀的文字描述。An object's property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance. 描述主要是用來針對視力或眼盲的使用者，提供更大的內容，但也可以使用內容搜尋或其他應用程式。The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications. 屬性描述不明顯，如果需要或者如果不是備援根據物件的， ， ，和屬性。The property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is not redundant based on the object's , , , and properties. 例如，標示的按鈕**確定**操作不需要其他資訊，但是顯示圖片的仙人掌的按鈕。For example, a button labeled **OK** would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would. 和和或許仙人掌按鈕屬性會描述其用途，但屬性會傳達資訊是無形的例如"的按鈕顯示圖片的仙人掌。 」The and and, perhaps, properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus." 可存取物件的屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 內容的描述性屬性 > 中 MSDN Library 中的"Active Accessibility > 一節，網址http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 如需範例，請參閱類別。For samples, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 錨定在其父控制項的控制項，可確保，錨定的邊緣仍保留在相同位置相對於邊緣父控制項的父控制項調整大小。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式，因此它只會顯示已發生按。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用和傳遞事件事件處理常式。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the and events which pass a to the event handler. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果您有兩個事件處理常式，如和事件、和按兩下表單時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have two event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下項目時，不支援事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If an item is double-clicked that does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ，和屬性，以及控制代碼事件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties, and handle the event. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`movingToolStrip`呼叫`InitializeMovingToolStrip`表單的建構函式中或`Load`事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `movingToolStrip` and call `InitializeMovingToolStrip` in the form's constructor or `Load` event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只適用於流程配置。This property applies only to flow layouts. 使用屬性來定義如何其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，設定至導致其父控制項的左邊緣對齊本身，並會隨著調整父控制項調整大小。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控制項停駐在其疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 沿著表單上控制項的視覺化圖層。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控制項可以停駐於父容器的某一邊或可停駐的邊緣和填滿的父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.

span.span: Occurs when the item is double-clicked with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果您有兩個事件處理常式，如和事件、和按兩下表單時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have two event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下項目時，不支援事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If an item is double-clicked that does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者第一次拖曳滑鼠游標放在項目拖放作業期間，系統就會引發事件。The event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the item during a drag-and-drop operation. 下列的 < 備註 > 會說明如何及何時會引發與拖放作業相關的事件。The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的項目。The method determines the item under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此項目是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target. 如果項目是有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the item is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 以下列方式會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、 鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態變更：Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個項目，針對該控制項就會引發。If the mouse enters another item, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的項目內便就會引發事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . 如果值是、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is , the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置，如下所示：The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - 如果值是，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is , the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是、就會引發事件。If the value of is , the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性會在螢幕座標中，工作區座標。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將轉換和屬性，以用戶端。The following code example shows how to convert the and properties to a client . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is , the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是、就會引發事件。If the value of is , the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 發生於拖曳作業時。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業開始時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 事件允許拖曳事件修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的來源。The event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 下列的 < 備註 > 會說明如何及何時會引發與拖放作業相關的事件。The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的項目。The method determines the item under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此項目是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target. 如果項目是有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the item is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 以下列方式會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、 鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態變更：Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個項目，針對該控制項就會引發。If the mouse enters another item, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的項目內便就會引發事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . 如果值是、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is , the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置，如下所示：The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - 如果值是，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is , the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是、就會引發事件。If the value of is , the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視窗訊息來判斷是否應該前置處理過或直接寄給指定的輸入的字元前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the . 如果方法會傳回`true`，指定的字元直接寄給。If the method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the . 不過，如果該方法會傳回`false`，字元會前置處理，並只傳送給如果它不由前置處理階段。However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否另一個控制項的助憶鍵。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是在處理命令的索引鍵前置處理的訊息。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令索引鍵是一律優先於一般輸入索引鍵的索引鍵。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器及功能表快速鍵。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不命令按鍵。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 基底類別實作方法會傳回`false`在所有情況下。The base-class implementation of method returns `false` in all cases.

When overriding the method in a derived class, the method override should return to indicate that it has processed the key. Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是提供項目有機會處理助憶鍵字元。This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法應該決定是否在項目處於的狀態處理助憶鍵，是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 此基底類別實作依賴主機控制項以呼叫方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合的項目文字的助憶鍵。This base-class implementation relies on the host control to call the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text. 在此情況下，方法就會引發事件，並傳回`true`。In this case, the method raises the event and returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryContinueDrag As QueryContinueDragEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於拖放作業時，允許拖曳來源決定是否應取消拖放作業。

span.span: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業期間鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更時，會引發事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation. 事件允許拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。The event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 下列的 < 備註 > 會說明如何及何時會引發與拖放作業相關的事件。The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的項目。The method determines the item under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此項目是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target. 如果項目是有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the item is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 以下列方式會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、 鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態變更：Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個項目，針對該控制項就會引發。If the mouse enters another item, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的項目內便就會引發事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . 如果值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置，如下所示：The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
